item.title: Thoughtstream Last Updated:
item.description: This is where I dump my thoughts instead of using Twitter or Facebook. 2022-03-03 23:22:52 We are living in unprecidented times all of the time. 2022-03-03 08:06:55 When do they tell us we are in an alternate reality? 2022-03-02 16:01:21 This is the age where people stop fighting for the ones that were given too much power. 2022-02-27 11:05:36 Simulation theory seems to be in our favor this week.
